sys_ui_macro.description: Available variables include: id - REQUIRED - string label - REQUIRED - string checked - boolean value - string assignto - string cb_class - string label_class - string
sys_ui_macro.name: Product_Checkboxes
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<j:set var="jvar_tableName" value="x_ouhs2_risk_asses_risk_assessment_services" />
<g:call function="x_ouhs2_risk_asses_Render_Checkbox.xml" id="network" cb_class="customCB" label_class="customLabel" label="This product connects to the OUHSC network and/or communicates with any computer" value="" replace="${jvar_tableName}.u_network" />
<g:call function="x_ouhs2_risk_asses_Render_Checkbox.xml" id="sensitivedata" label="This product interacts with sensitive data." value="" replace="${jvar_tableName}.u_sensitivedata" />
<g:call function="x_ouhs2_risk_asses_Render_Checkbox.xml" id="development" label="Will the product require application development, web development or database connectivity from HSC Information Technology?" value="" replace="${jvar_tableName}.u_development" />
<g:call function="x_ouhs2_risk_asses_Render_Checkbox.xml" id="sdsupport" label="The IT Service Desk is expected to provide support for this product." value="" replace="${jvar_tableName}.u_sdsupport" />
<!-- <g:ui_checkbox name="tbTest" value="" title="This is a test of the checkbox g:ui" class="myGUIclass" /> --> </j:jelly>
